layer at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 770x94 [bgcolor=#000000]
layer at (8,8) size 770x94

      LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 93x74
